p.i: Q: Whats a library without usecases?

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: There are numerous use cases for an engine like Commons SCXML. Any process that can be represented as a UML state chart, for example, business process flows, view navigation bits, interaction or dialog management etc. (this is, by no means, a comprehensive list), can leverage the Commons SCXML engine library. We illustrate just a few sample usecases within frameworks in the open source community as illustrations.
